name: oopstart
short_description:
OOPSTART is a general purpose C++ library promoting rapid development and efficient, maintainable code. The acronym - Object Oriented Programming for Science, Technology and the ARTs - was chosen to reflect the broad applicability of the project.

Our goals were two-fold: to address recurring development headaches as cleanly as possible; and to explore ways of increasing the generic capabilities of C++ for free.

Many of OOPSTART's features now have analogues in other places: C++11, TR1, Digitalmars' wonderful 'D' programming language, and the BOOST libraries are some of our favourites, but OOPSTART continues to promote a clean, efficient and maintainable approach to lightweight C++ cross-platform development.

OOPSTART is released under the terms of the BOOST Software License
